item.description:
POSTPONED TO JUNE 11th DUE TO WEATHER FORECAST! It happens every year.

It's one of the few events that you can commute to and park in Davis Square without getting a Parking ticket!

Celebrate 25 years of BBQ and Beer.

Redbones 16th Annual Bike Party and Benefit takes place on Monday, June 4 from 5 -9 pm at Redbones in Davis Square.

Rain date is Monday, June 11.

Live Music by The Second Line Social Aid and Pleasure Society Brass Band.

Entry cost is $15.00 includes food and drink, raffle ticket and bike valet parking.

Addittional raffle tickets 1@ $2.00, 3 @ $5.00

Proceeds to Mass Bike and NEMBA

 For information call Redbones at 617-628-2200 or go to www.redbones.com. [url=redbones.com][/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Yes RSVPs E Mail each other to meet
item.name: 16th Annual Bike Party & Benefit at Redbones - 25 years of BBQ & Beer
